code: import{local,session}from"./storage";import cogoToast from"cogo-toast";export var _roleFinance=13;export var generateActions=function generateActions(action){action=action.toUpperCase();return{REQUEST:"".concat(action,"_REQUEST"),SUCCESS:"".concat(action,"_SUCCESS"),FAILURE:"".concat(action,"_FAILURE")};};export var _isAnEmpytyObject=function _isAnEmpytyObject(obj){for(var key in obj){if(obj.hasOwnProperty(key))return false;}return true;};export var _textCapitalize=function _textCapitalize(text){return text&&text.charAt(0).toUpperCase()+text.slice(1).toLowerCase();};export var getToken=function getToken(){var token="";var local_token=local.getObject("token").access;token=(_isAnEmpytyObject(local_token)?"":local_token)||session.get("token");return token;};export var getUser=function getUser(){var local_user=session.getObject("user");var user=_isAnEmpytyObject(local_user)?null:local_user;return user;};export var _removeUnderscore=function _removeUnderscore(word){return word===null||word===void 0?void 0:word.split("_").join(" ");};export var isUserLoggedIn=function isUserLoggedIn(){var user=getUser();if(!_isAnEmpytyObject(user))return true;return false;};export var showToast=function showToast(message,type){if(type)type=type.toLowerCase();switch(type){case"success":cogoToast.success(message,{position:"top-right"});break;case"info":cogoToast.info(message,{position:"top-right"});break;case"loading":cogoToast.loading(message,{position:"top-right"});break;case"warn":cogoToast.warn(message,{position:"top-right"});break;case"error":cogoToast.error(message,{position:"top-right"});break;default:cogoToast.info(message,{position:"top-right"});break;}};export*from"./storage";
